Name: French Toast
Instructions: Whisk eggs and milk together. Dip bread in the mixture and cook until golden brown.

Name: Creamy Pasta
Instructions: Cook pasta. Heat cream and mix with cooked pasta. Season with salt and pepper.

Name: Eggs on Toast
Instructions: Toast bread and cook eggs. Place cooked eggs on top of the toast.

Name: Toast with Cheese
Instructions: Toast bread and add cheese on top. Melt the cheese if desired.

Name: Mac and Cheese
Instructions: Cook pasta. Melt cheese with milk and mix with cooked pasta. Season to taste.

Name: Tomato and Olive Oil Omelette
Instructions: Beat the eggs, cook them together with the tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, then fold and serve.
